title: OraBrush
content:
Straight to the point:

I need to know the name of this typeface...both if possible.

Thanks in advance.

ab.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [OraBrush.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023073833/http:/typophile.com/files/OraBrush.JPG) | 13.37 KB |
author: andy_ab11

comments.content:
Almost certainly a corruption of [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/).

Strapline looks like a narrower version of Gotham too.

We should've expected that: Gotham got the Harabara\* treatment.

\* [http://typophile.com/node/61906](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023073833/http:/typophile.com/node/61906 "http://typophile.com/node/61906")
